About Grouper

Internet2 Groups Management Toolkit - Parent Project

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
MorphString morphString
Grouper Client Client for Grouper LDAP and Web Services
Subject API Integrates java applications with existing Identity Management operations
Grouper API Internet2 Groups Management Toolkit
Grouper Plugin for Shibboleth Provides DataConnector and AttributeDefinition extensions for the Shibboleth AttributeResolver
Grouper SCIM Implementation of SCIM for Grouper
